r.s: Provides a wrapper to the Image Magick Library.
r.d: It's a native php-extension. See the examples in the examples/ directory for some hints on how to use it.
r.n: - functions added: imagick_chop() imagick_crop() imagick_flip() imagick_flop() imagick_roll() imagick_getimagedepth() imagick_getnumbercolors() imagick_isgrayimage() imagick_ismonochromeimage() imagick_isopaqueimage() imagick_ispaletteimage() imagick_ordereddither() imagick_composite() - Added IMAGICK_COMPOSITE_OP_* for use with imagick_composite().
